name: TD AMERITRADE
sampleDescriptions: Equity Market Structure issues.  Fiduciary Duty.
Transaction tax; tax reform (HR1 - Tax Cuts & Jobs Act) re: Financial products taxation as it relates to options and FIFO cost basis.
Equity Market Structure issues. Options Market issues.  Options Market Stability Act (H.R. 5749).  Fiduciary Duty.  H.R. 3555, Exchange Regulatory Improvement Act.
